Pick two consecutive positive integers whose sum is less than $100$. Square both\\
of those integers and then find the difference of the squares. Which of the\\
following could be the difference?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 2 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 64 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 79 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 96 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 131$
